int buildConfigCache ( )

For performance - cache the config in a structure.

char* getConfig ( const char *  key)

Get a configuration by key.

Parameters:
keyThe key of the configuration.
Returns:
The configuration with the give key. NOTFOUND if no configuration with that key exists.
